thread.title: Hilton Garden Inn Columbia SC Northeast Announces Family Fun Package
thread.title_full: Hilton Garden Inn Columbia SC Northeast Announces Family Fun Package - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Hilton Garden Inn Columbia SC Northeast Announces Family Fun Package
text:
The Hilton Garden Inn Columbia, South Carolina Northeast announces the Family Fun Package for three night stays.
 COLUMBIA, SC, August 01, The Hilton Garden Inn Northeast in Columbia, South Carolina announces a special Family Fun Package for guests. A family of four booking a three night minimum stay will receive complimentary WiFi, late checkout on weekends, and free breakfast for two adults and two children under age 12. This hotel deal is perfect for families vacationing in the Columbia area. Nearby attractions to explore include Riverbanks Zoo and Garden, EdVenture Children's Museum, and the Congaree Vista.
"We are pleased to offer our guests the Family Fun Package," shares Amber Cobia, Director of Sales at the Hilton Garden Inn Columbia Northeast. "Families visiting Columbia this summer will appreciate this affordable hotel deal which includes daily breakfast for four," continues Ms. Cobia.
This award winning Columbia SC hotel features non-smoking guest rooms with Garden Sleep System adjustable beds. An in-room microwave, refrigerator, and free high speed Internet will help guests feel at home. Roomy suites with sleeper sofas are available. Guests can lounge in the hotel's heated indoor pool or enjoy a work out in the fitness center. Other amenities at this property include a 24-hour business center and Pavilion Pantry Market for snacks and sundries. The onsite restaurant, Garden Grille and Bar, is a convenient choice for breakfast, dinner, or evening room service. The Hilton Garden Inn Columbia Northeast recently received the Hotel Success Award, the highest honor for the brand, for the 3rd consecutive year.
HHonors members will earn points toward free hotel nights. AAA, senior, and military rates are available. This Columbia South Carolina hotel is located off I-77 at Exit 19 (Farrow Road). To book your stay at the Hilton Garden Inn Columbia Northeast, call 803-807-9000 or visit www.ColumbiaSouthCarolinaHotel.com .
About Hilton Garden Inn Columbia SC Hotel (Northeast)
The recently opened Hilton Garden Inn Columbia/Northeast hotel is located just off I-77 at exit 19, near the Northeast business district and is conveniently situated just 11 miles from downtown Columbia. This Columbia, South Carolina hotel was built with features and amenities to ensure you'll truly have a great stay with us including complimentary Wi-Fi, 24-hour business center, meeting space, heated indoor pool with hot tub, and The Garden Grill and Bar restaurant. Guests can enjoy staying at The Hilton Garden Inn Columbia SC hotel, where everything is right where you need it.
For more information visit: http://www.ColumbiaSouthCarolinaHotel
For all media inquiries, please contact:
Allison Reinert
Cardinal Web Solutions
